page.title: 13Forestry,Cortachy
page.content: On{Airlie Estate}there are 3.5 thousand acres of trees.This is a considerabiy large business compared with some others.Up until the 1950's the estate had its own sawmill but now the wood is sold to various sawmills in the area. Most of the trees planted are{Sitka {Spruce}as it grows very quickly,being cut down at 25_30 years old.At one time seed was bought from the{Queen {Charlotte Islands}off the{Canadian} coast and the seedlings raised on the estate,but now seedlings are bought from nurseries. Deciduous trees are also planted and attention is paid to conserving the beauty of the country_side.The highest tree is in the castle grounds.It is a {Wellingtonia Redwood}and is 143 feet high.5 foresters and 1 junior trapper are employed all year round.
